kpi.name: M1002C513

kpi_info.title: FACH TO DCH FROM HSPA TO NON-HSPA LAYER
kpi_info.use: The number of FACH to DCH state transitions directing the UE from HSPA layer to non-HSPA layer. When the RNC receives RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION COMPLETE or RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP COMPLETE message from the UE after transferring the UE from FACH to DCH state with redirection from HSPA layer to non-HSPA layer.This counter is updated for the cell in which the radio link is setup.

kpi.kpi_alias: FACH TO DCH FROM HSPA TO NON-HSPA LAYER
